1089540.name: 911 FR
1089540.description:
911 FR - 3D action opening the world of the sunniest city on the Pacific coast. Try being a law enforcement officer, rush to help in an ambulance, or respond to reports of a tree cat.

In creating the game, we build on the concept of the virtual version of Los Angeles, but all the names of geographical points, streets and house numbers have been replaced and replaced. All the matches with real objects - random.



Gaming features:

  • large gaming card;
  • 20+ accessible special-purpose vehicles;
  • 50+ random events;
  • 3 main departments - PD, EMS, FD:
  • plot-questing system;
  • much more...

Errors and problems

The game is Early Access and can have different bugs, errors and problems. If you encounter one, please report to the Community Centre. There you can present your ideas and suggestions for the development of the game.


911FR - our first game. Valuable and extensive experience in creating a game world. And we have big plans for the development of 911FR, creating new game worlds on the subject of emergency services.
1089540.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 乌克兰语
